robot.display

Class Display

  • java.lang.Object
    • robot.display.Display
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    lejos.utility.TimerListener

    public class Display
extends java.lang.Object
implements lejos.utility.TimerListener
    The LCD display class will display the readings from the sensors and odometer. This class implements TimerListener which means that it will run at a 'constant' interval

      static class  Display.Mode
      Mode setting for the class, changes what the LCD actually displays
